name: I can't find my keys and I need to go to work
name_original: I can't find my keys and I need to go to work
description:
You have to go to work, but you can't find your keys.

Its just a fast test game that I did on Bitsy 

Controls:

use arrow keys to move. walk up to an item to interact with it.

 You can play it in your PC with a Keyboard
